extendedInfo.description: GO SMS Pro Emoji plugin, enable you to send funny emoji icons to iPhone or Android phones with GO SMS Proand its Emoji plugin. Note that the emoji are sent by SMS, need no MMS.â¥â¥â¥ Directionâ¥â¥â¥ Please read carefully. Thanks.1. TO better use Emoji, please update your GO SMS Pro to version v4.67(or the latest), and install the GO SMS Pro Emoji plugin.2. IF you send emoji to Android phone, please make sure that the recipients also have had GO SMS Pro and GO SMS Pro Emoji plugin installed, so that emoji can be displayed correctly  in their phones.3. IF you send emoji to iPhone, the recipient need not install any plugin.4. Emoji encoding settings is in GO SMS Pro's SettingsâApplication SettingsâEmoji encoding settings.5. TO input emoji, go to compose message UI, and press paper clip bottom.â¥â¥â¥ Problems Overcomeâ¥â¥â¥- If ur having a problem where Android users can't see your Emoji, go to GO SMS Pro Settings > Application Settings > Emoji Encoding Settings & choose GO SMS. That will enable Android users who you text to see your Emoji. THESE ANDROID USERS MUST HAVE GO SMS PRO AND GO SMS EMOJI PLUGIN INSTALLED ON THEIR DEVICE, IF THEY DONT, THEY WONT SEE YOUR EMOJI. - To have iPhone users see ur Emoji, follow directions above but choose iPhone/SoftBank instead.

reviews.title: Good but needs to be fixed galaxy s3
reviews.comment: I can only see my the emojis through go SMS pro and I wanna be able to see them for everything I use like kik, voxer, pinger, email, facebook, twitter, instagram, tumblr, etc. Make that possible please!
reviews.author: Breanna Waters

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Finally free emojis. Just need to be categorized for easy and fast finding
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor poor poor!
reviews.comment: The Smiley faces are still blank boxes to me! And when I want to open Go  SMS emoji plugin, they say this app is not installed on my phone! Hey, even my task manager said that this app is already being downloaded in my phone! Why can\'t I open it!?
reviews.author: Han Hui Zhen

reviews.title: Love it but. .
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this plug in for a while. .I thought it just allowed me to see emoji from iphone users. .I just realized I can too send them on go sms..I now like the plug in more. .. make it Where we can use them on instagram and fb too please!!!!!!
reviews.author: Stephanie MzBlkberyRozay

reviews.title: Gs3
reviews.comment: I have No cute Smileys like it shows in your pictures. The only Smileys I see are the ones I have to download, and They\'re all ugly!
reviews.author: Myrna Olvera

reviews.title: Go SMS Pro Emolji
reviews.comment: So cute, fun, adorable, & entertainingly fun!!!
reviews.author: LORI NEVERS

reviews.title: Doesnt work properly.
reviews.comment: I can see the emojis on my screen, but when I send them to anyone with an IOS they arent able to see them! Is there some setting I need to change ?
reviews.author: supreet chahal

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: Galaxy note 2, on launch, just advertise for the Pro version. The only option available is to go to  play store & download the Pro version!!!!
reviews.author: jim hendian

reviews.comment: This app is terrible every time I try to open it, it tells my it\'s not installed all the other sms apps the theme one I can\'t open either its verry irritating.
reviews.author: Janellys Martinez

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.comment: THIS IS GREAT. I LOVE IT AND I LOVE ALL THE EMOJIS. AWESOME .  KEEP IT UP
reviews.author: Shaun Du Val

reviews.title: Super cool
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this app. Its easy to use and so much fun.
reviews.author: Nicole DuPree

reviews.title: Cant be used on ig or fb
reviews.comment: If it worked for social networks then 5 stars but until then only for text msgs blah!
reviews.author: Yesenia N Ortiz

reviews.title: Emojis
reviews.comment: When will it have all the emojis an iPhone has, it needs an upgrade. Most of the time I have to forclose the app due to the emojis not even popping up. Is this just on my phone ? -S3
reviews.author: Danielle Flores

reviews.title: Do I have to download keyboard for emoji?
reviews.comment: It only works for go sms. It would be better if android users could also use it for Twitter, Instagram, Facebook and other. I\'ll give one star if that is fixed and another star if it doesn\'t make problems
reviews.author: Zen Taplac

reviews.title: Flaw
reviews.comment: I can only see my emoji not other people with the same app.... fix this please
reviews.author: Zach Fairchild

reviews.title: This has never worked on any model of my phones
reviews.comment: I have the galaxy s4 and can see the emojis I send but emojis from my Iphone using friends show up as wierd symbols and all jacked. Please fix.
reviews.author: Keara Bennett

reviews.title: Others can\'t see emojis saying not installed
reviews.comment: I can see my friends emojis but they can\'t see mine.  My phone says its installed but when I click the icon it says its not! Fix this pleaseeeee
reviews.author: Ambor Darlington

reviews.title: Can\'t send emojis
reviews.comment: You can see the emojis people send .. but when you send them they come up as a code :/ !!
reviews.author: Nicole Mazza

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2x 2.3.5
reviews.comment: Thx to battery monitor I finally found what was draining my battery. I\'m rooted so I can live without it. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: cam Clark

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work! POS
reviews.comment: Everytime I try to send a text using emojis it doesn\'t send, no matter how good of cell coverage I have. But as soon as I delete the emojis and resend the text, it sends perfectly. Can you explain why this is happening?
reviews.author: Sean Williams
